Title: Siramika Solid Wood Coffee Table in Honey Oak Finish
Description: Mudramark takes inspiration from our rich cultural heritage and ingenious art. Mudramark proudly ushers in the best handcrafted furniture from across India and brings it closer to you. Carefully curated to give your homes an ethnic touch, each creation is a piece de resistance that gives your space a definitive personality. Coffee Tables are low tables used in living room spaces placed in the centre of seating furniture. Used for drinks, flowers, and is a general table for placing items.  Furniture bought on Pepperfry.com comes with a 3 Year Warranty against any manufacturing defects. So go ahead and buy with confidence.
